class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.audit.AudStudyProtocol
class.comment: Audit of information about study protocols.

column.name: CHANGE_REASON_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to the reason for change in change_reason table

column.name: STUDY_PROTOCOL_ID
column.comment: Study protocol identifier.

column.name: STUDY_NUMBER
column.comment: A unique study identifier used in house by laboratory personnel.

column.name: SPONSOR_STUDY_NUMBER
column.comment: The sponsor's study identifier.

column.name: STUDY_TITLE
column.comment: A unique protocol identifier used in house by laboratory personnel.

column.name: STUDY_DIRECTOR
column.comment: Person in charge of this study.

column.name: SPONSOR_STUDY_TITLE
column.comment: The sponsor's protocol identifier.

column.name: CONTACT_ID
column.comment: The sponsor representative's identifier.

column.name: CASCADE_ACCESSION_NUMBER
column.comment: Flag indicating whether or not the sample tube ids are to be automatically generated based upon the accession number.

column.name: BARCODE_LENGTH
column.comment: Length of the sponsor's barcodes.

column.name: FINAL_TUBE_BARCODE_LOW_VALUE
column.comment: Beginning barcode for a range of sample tubes sent back to the sponsor.

column.name: FINAL_TUBE_BARCODE_HIGH_VALUE
column.comment: Ending barcode for a range of sample tubes sent back to the sponsor.

column.name: STUDY_CLOSED
column.comment: Flag to indicate whether or not a study is complete.

column.name: SHIP_DNA_BACK
column.comment: Flag indicating whether or not DNA samples are to be shipped back to the sponsor.

column.name: ACCESSION_VAR_OCX
column.comment: Used to store the name of the OCX control used to display attributes for the accession.

column.name: STUDY_VAR_OCX
column.comment: Used to store the name of the OCX control used to display attributes for the accession.

column.name: PATIENT_VAR_OCX
column.comment: Used to store the name of the OCX control used to display attributes for the accession.

column.name: STUDY_URL
column.comment: URL associated with the STUDY

column.name: ORGANIZATION_ID
column.comment: Current sponsor_company when MOD/DEL occurred for the study protocol.

column.name: COMPANY
column.comment: Current sponsor_company when MOD/DEL occurred for the study protocol.

column.name: STUDY_TYPE
column.comment: Type of Study

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.comment: User who created the record.

column.name: DATE_CREATED
column.comment: Date the record was created.

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.comment: User who last modified the record.

column.name: DATE_MODIFIED
column.comment: Date the record was last modified.

column.name: CHANGED_BY
column.comment: User who caused this audit transaction to take place.

column.name: DATE_CHANGED
column.comment: Date this audit transaction took place.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Activity that triggered this audit transaction (mod or del).
